**Example 1: 样例**



Input: 

```
tccli wedata CreateDataSource --cli-unfold-argument  \
    --BizParams string \
    --Category DB \
    --DatabaseName db \
    --Description string \
    --Display saga \
    --Name striaasdgng \
    --Params string \
    --ClusterId cdb-xxasfsdg6d \
    --Status 1 \
    --Type CLICKHOUSE \
    --Collect 1 \
    --OwnerProjectId 100265651 \
    --OwnerProjectName pprasf \
    --OwnerProjectIdent striasdgang \
    --COSBucket string \
    --COSRegion string
```

Output: 
```
{
    "Response": {
        "RequestId": "123",
        "Data": "1"
    }
}
```
